resultTable.sql:
insert overwrite table ${result_db}.dm_ct_pm_4gc_sgw_mme_d partition(p_date='${p_date}')
select substr('${p_start_time}',1,8) as starttime, EQUIP_DESC as equip_name, NODE_DESC as node_name, EQUIP_TYPE as equip_type, OS_TYPE as os_type, EQUIP_ATTRIBUTE as equip_attribute, EQUIP_IP as equip_ip, DISK_USE_RAT as disk_use_rat, CPU_USE_RAT as cpu_use_rat, MEMORY_USE_RAT as memory_use_rat from ${source_db}.ç”¨æˆ·æä¾ where p_date>='${p_date_start}' and p_date<'${p_date_end}'
